title: Shared development priorities create momentum for Vietnam–El Salvador cooperation: Salvadoran Vice President
description:
Hanoi (VNA) – Vietnam and El Salvador share many similarities as Pacific nations with aligned socio-economic development priorities, Salvadoran Vice President Félix Ulloa has said, noting that these commonalities lay a strong foundation for expanding bilateral cooperation.

title: El Salvador Buys $100M Of Bitcoin Despite Price Crash
description:

title: BTC News: El Salvador Makes Largest-Ever Bitcoin Buy With 1,090 BTC Addition
description:
El Salvador defied IMF warnings by purchasing 1,090 BTC for $101M amidst a market dip, marking its largest-ever acquisition and adding to daily buys.

El Salvador is actively buying the dip. In addition to its daily 1 $BTC purchases, the government just bought an extra 1,090.19 $BTC ($101M) an hour ...
